title: 39 Piece General Household Tool Set
description: Essential hand tools for everyday home repairs, DIY, and crafts. Comes in a convenient toolbox storage case.

title: Mixing Bowls Set
description: 8-piece stainless steel nesting bowls with airtight lids and grater attachments. Perfect for mixing and serving.

title: Qtip Holder Dispenser
description: Clear plastic canister set for cotton swabs, balls, and pads. Ideal for bathroom essentials and makeup storage.

title: Trivets for Hot Dishes
description: Set of 4 heat-resistant trivets for protecting your table from hot pots and pans. Essential kitchen accessories.

title: Silicone Utensil Rest
description: Durable and heat-resistant spoon rest with drip pad to keep your kitchen counter clean.

title: Large Laundry Basket
description: Waterproof and collapsible laundry hamper with extended handles for easy carrying. Perfect for clothes or toys.
